name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 8, Nanchang, Jiangxi Province
A man encountered an old man and his child picking up bottles in the middle of the night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @big_ear_cat He just scolded the second princess of Huawei

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, a netizen in Hangzhou was visited by the police station because the toy model he bought contained the word "drone" and he signed an aircraft safety commitment letter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A netizen posted a video on Douyin saying that he was suddenly arrested by the police while having dinner with friends in the early morning of September 3. Afterwards, the police said they had arrested the wrong person, but did not apologize.
The netizen posted the video online and asked the police to apologize, which triggered a discussion in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Huayu School, Anshan City, Liaoning Province
A parent gave a red envelope to a teacher that was too small, causing his child to be beaten and scolded by the teacher at school. The child refused to go to school and the parent burst into tears in the corridor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 15, the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission issued the "Guiding Opinions", which will strictly deal with accounts that first incite cyber violence.
In fact, in recent years, from the Communist Youth League Central Committee to various patriotic big and small Vs, cyber violence and human flesh searches against ordinary netizens have emerged in an endless stream. It is hoped that the issuance of this "Guiding Opinions" can effectively safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of the majority of netizens on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, in Dazhou, Sichuan, a 20-year-old supermarket worker had a collision with an elderly man while delivering goods. After paying 100 yuan in compensation, the elderly man’s family demanded an additional 5,000 yuan in compensation. He was fired by the supermarket afterwards and eventually chose to jump into the river and die.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/dcWX6umqHJ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, a school’s academic affairs office issued an announcement stating that it had received a call from someone pretending to be from the CDC, which required the school to notify parents to participate in the live broadcast. The school apologized to the parents and hoped that parents would be careful not to be deceived.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 14, Jilin Province Changchun Jiliang Group
Due to long-term arrears of wages and social security, employees went to Jiliang Holdings to hold banners to demand wages. According to the content of the banners, some people have been owed wages for four or five months.
When they heard that slogans were being shouted at the scene, several uniformed personnel came out of the hall and said that banners and slogans were not allowed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, some netizens discovered that all the manhole covers in Hangzhou were also affixed with security inspection labels.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens submitted a post saying that it is suspected that due to the impact of the Asian Games, the number of shared bicycles in Hangzhou has begun to decrease, and some people have also discussed this on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Previously, when President Xi Jinping visited Harbin Engineering University, the manhole covers were also sealed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, a man holding a national flag on the streets of Xiamen called on everyone to be vigilant, not to forget the national humiliation, and to remember history.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 15, Henan Zhoukou Expressway Service Area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting from September 16, affected by the Asian Games, the Ningbo-Hangzhou South intercity train was suspended. This train is a public transportation train that uses the remaining capacity of the existing Xiaoyong Railway. It is a rare railway bus in China that does not require a real-name system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Musk's new biography has been popular in China, but some netizens found that the Chinese translation deleted the paragraph in which Musk criticized the California government during the epidemic. In the original version, Musk said, "(People) can't leave their houses. If they leave, they will be arrested. This is fascism. This is not democracy, not freedom. Give people back their freedom."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of September 8, Binzhou Vocational College of Science and Technology forced freshmen to unload trucks and move materials in the new dormitory building until 1 a.m. The students exposed their complaints on Kuaishou, and were visited by the Student Affairs Office, who held a two-hour struggle session to accuse them of having no sense of collective honor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, residents of Sanqiaoxin Street, Weiyang District, Xi'an, blocked the road to protest their rights due to forced charges by the property management company, water and electricity outages and power cuts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Multiple photos] On September 15, the Capital Medical University student dormitory Bojin Building
In order to cope with the fire inspection, the students' belongings piled in the corridor because the dormitory space was too small were cleared. This move caused strong dissatisfaction and negotiations among students.
Angry students directly put their valuables outside the door and wrote on the wall to warn that they would call the police if anyone dared to take them away to protest.
During the negotiation with the teacher, the student said that the dormitory was too small to put his things, and the teacher said that you are here to study.
It is reported that the school dormitory has 6 people living in 10 square meters, and the space is not enough, so students will pile their clothes and shoes in the corridor, but when they woke up this morning, they found that their personal belongings were cleared without any notice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: What happened

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Dialogue between students and the deputy secretary of the Party Committee of Capital Medical University School of Basic Medical Sciences

content: The protest continued into the evening

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, at the Shanglin Road subway entrance in Shanglin Street, Xianyang City, the owners of the community blocked the road in protest because Dawocheng Property Management did not allow temporary parking for the owners of the community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 13, Taiyuan
The owners of Taihe Jinzun Mansion protested in front of China Construction Bank
Accusing the branch of CCB for violating laws and regulations, which led to the unfinished Taihe Jinzun Mansion
Demanding that the corrupt officials be arrested, the houses be relocated, and the money be returned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why have you worked so hard but your salary hasn't increased in all these years? 
Li Jiaqi's casual question broke the defense of countless netizens. 
Domestic products are getting more expensive, and wages are getting lower and lower. Why can one sentence cause the whole society to break defense and anger? 
There are actually many things worth thinking about in this matter. 
Li Jiaqi, uncovered the fig leaf of China's economic downturn [Teacher Li is not your teacher]

content: Recently, music festivals in many places announced that due to the clash with Martyrs' Day on September 30, the performances on that day will be cancelled.

content: On September 13, urban management officers in Laohekou City, Hubei Province, beat up citizens while enforcing the law. The local authorities responded by saying that those in uniform are not necessarily urban management officers.
